editorialNotes.tagline: Sunny with a chance of snark
editorialNotes.standard: This is the weather app with personality.. if you’re OK with sarcasm, political jokes, and the occasional insult. But how good is it at the weather part? Drawing data from Foreca, one of meteorology’s more accurate forecasting services, it’s pretty great.
